css/sass - ; - ; - ; - ## (Syntax and Formatting) ### 4tab tab4tab ```scss .nav { nav-tab { ... } } .nav { nav-tab { ... } } ``` ```css .nav { nav-tab { ... } } .nav { nav-tab { ... } } ``` ### CSS ```css header { color: red; height: 10px} ``` ```css header { color: red; height: 10px; } ``` ### ```css /*------------------------------------*\ #SECTION- \*------------------------------------*/ .selector { } ``` 100 ### sass 1/5 ```css header { .nav { } .menu { } } footer { .copyright { } .date { } } ``` ```css /*------------------------------------*\ #SECTION-Header \*------------------------------------*/ header { .nav { } .menu { } } /*------------------------------------*\ #SECTION-Footer \*------------------------------------*/ footer { .copyright { } .date { } } ``` .nav .menu .copyright .date header footer ## (Naming Conventions) ### 1. `g-`global `g-header` `g-nav` swiper ```css /*------------------------------------*\ #SECTION-Swiper \*------------------------------------*/ .g-swiper { .g-swiper-container { ... } .g-swiper-item { ... } } ``` swiper `home.html` swiper swiper `g-` ```html
``` ### 2. ```html
``` - `g-swiper` `g-swiper-vertical`.home .g-swiper - html `ex-` `extend` Java CSS `ex-` + `` `g-swiper` `ex-swiper` `ex-g-swiper` ```html
``` ### 3. UI **** **** `ex-` ### 4. jQuery `vi-` `vi-home`vi view; ionic `` `vi-` ``` ``` `vi-home` css ```scss // home .vi-home { /*------------------------------------*\ #SECTION-module1 \*------------------------------------*/ .module1 { .container { } } /*------------------------------------*\ #SECTION-module2 \*------------------------------------*/ .module2 { .container { } } } ``` ### 5. CSS CSS BEM block + element + modifier - block UI headernavinfoCardmenubutton - element block containercontentitemlistrow - modifier block/element errorlefthoverprimarymini blockblock + element block + modifier block + element + modifier `Bootstrap` BEM `Bootstrap` **block:** `.nav` `.table` `.btn` **block + modifier:** `.nav-stacked` `.tab-striped ` `.btn-primary` **block + element:** `.nav-tabs` `.dropdown-menu` `.btn-group` `.btn-toolbar` **block + modifier + modifier:** `.navbar-static-top` **block + element + modifier:** `.input-group-addon` `.form-control-static` > `g-` `Bootstrap` ## SASS extend.scss ```scss // extend.scss /* home & product view common banner * home product banner */ %banner { ... } ``` ```scss // home.scss .home { .banner { @extend %banner; } } ``` ```scss // product.scss .product { .banner { @extend %banner; } } ``` home banner product home : ```scss // home.scss .home { .banner { @extend %banner; // overwrite ... ... } } ``` banner `extend.scss` UI ## JavaScript JavaScript class id name `js-` class id JS ```html
$('.js-date-content').text('.js-date-conten JS '); ``` ## HTML HTML html 12552131 sass ```html
